challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kak ty byh slyšal, to oni by byli tyhi.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formattedSolution: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kak ty bys ne byl glupy, to bys ne dělal glupostij.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Jak oni by byli ne lenivi, to my byhmo im pomagali.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Děte sut mudre za ih věk.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kak vy ne byste byli slabi, to vy byste rabotali.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kak ja by byl směly, to ja by ne bojil se.
